import Preloader from '../../common/preloader' import s from './ProfileInfo.module.css' import React from 'react' import ProfileStatusWithHooks from './ProfileStatusF' import ph from "../../../assets/images/tetatet.jpeg" const ProfileInfo = ({profile, status, updateStatus, isOwner, savePhoto}) => { if (!profile) return const uploadPhoto = (e) => { if (e.target.files.length) { savePhoto(e.target.files[0]) } } return
{isOwner && }
looking for a job: {profile.lookingForAJob ? 'yes' : 'no'}
My skills: {profile.lookingForAJobDescription}
About me: {profile.aboutMe}
} export default ProfileInfo
